snippet.description:

THE OFFICIAL SUBJECT 13 WEBSITE http://subject13.microids.com

THE GAME ON PC AND MAC 
(STEAM) http://store.steampowered.com/app/322970
(GOG) http://www.gog.com/game/subject_13

"SUBJECT 13" 

Subject 13" is the new adventure game developed by Paul Cuisset ("Flashback", "Future Wars" and "Moto Racer") in collaboration with Microïds ("Syberia", "Amerzone"…).

In "Subject 13", you embodie Franklin Fargo, a discreet physics professor. Franklin leads a lonely and bitter life since Sophie, his fiancée, was violently killed. After a fall in a lake while driving his car, he wakes up in a scientific abandoned underground plant with only one link with the outside world: a voice that calls him “Subject 13”. 

SUBJECT13 is available on PC and  Mac in English, French, Spanish, Italian and German. Other platforms will follow soon.
